summary: Vishnu is a major god in Hinduism, often called the Preserver in the Trimurti (three main gods). He is considered the supreme being in Vaishnavism, creating, protecting, and changing the universe. Vishnu is shown as both kind and powerful. He often takes the form of an avatar, like Rama or Krishna, to fight evil and keep the world in order. In art, he is often seen sleeping on a snake in the cosmic ocean with his wife, Lakshmi.
title: Vishnu
